query:
SELECT 'MEALS' as source, id, mealType, calories, protein, fat, carbs, fibre, 
       beverageCalories, beverageProtein, beverageFat, beverageCarbs, beverageFibre, beverageVolumeMl,
       loggedAt
FROM meals 
WHERE clientId = 1 AND DATE(loggedAt) = CURDATE()
UNION ALL
SELECT 'DRINKS' as source, id, drinkType as mealType, calories, protein, fat, carbs, fibre,
       0 as beverageCalories, 0 as beverageProtein, 0 as beverageFat, 0 as beverageCarbs, 0 as beverageFibre, volumeMl as beverageVolumeMl,
       loggedAt
FROM drinks
WHERE clientId = 1 AND DATE(loggedAt) = CURDATE()
ORDER BY loggedAt DESC;
